name: ai-app-monorepo
description: AI-powered web application with frontend and backend services

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.clean: cd frontend && rm -rf .next node_modules && cd ../backend && rm -rf .next node_modules
scripts.lint: cd frontend && npm run lint && cd ../backend && npm run lint
